title: By the King, a proclamation for preuention and restraint of the abuses and inconueniences occasioned by dying with logwood
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publisher: By Robert Barker and Iohn Bill ...,
notes: "Giuen at our palace of White-hall, the nine and twentieth day of February, in the seuenteenth yeere of our reigne ..."--P. [2].
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
